Lyric:
[00:03.26]Bruno Mars - All She Knows
[00:06.15]
[00:08.02]
[00:10.04]Maximal r&b - The Freshest & Hottest R&B/ Hip-Hop Music!
[00:13.00]
[00:20.69]Once again you're home alone
[00:24.39]Tears running from your eyes
[00:26.93]And I'm on the outside
[00:30.84]Knowing that you're all I want
[00:34.31]But I can't do anything
[00:37.00]I'm so helpless baby
[00:40.64]
[00:40.96]Everyday same old things
[00:43.17]So you're still feelin pain

[00:49.43]And it ain't her fault
[00:50.62]
[00:51.31]She knows better but
[00:53.15]She can't help it
[00:56.23]Wanna tell her
[00:57.58]But would that be selfish
[01:00.72]How do you heal
[01:02.84]A heart that can't feel, it's broken
[01:08.63]His love is all she knows, all she knows, all she knows
[01:18.42]His love is all she knows, all she knows, all she knows
[01:27.75]
[01:30.71]You've been livin this way so long
[01:34.38]You don't know the difference

[01:45.94]But you close your eyes on me
[01:48.53]So you still can't see
[01:50.69]

[01:53.17]So you're still feelin pain
[01:55.91]Never had real love before

[02:28.40]His love is all she knows, all she knows, all she knows
[02:38.33]
[02:40.68]All she knows is the pain

[02:47.29]She's still comfortable
